attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This inconvenience is costing us time and money to ring up banks to get details changed, and order extra statements to check if money has been taken from our accounts fraudulently.  If these CD’s are going to be misused, then this could happen at anytime, so how long do we have to keep checking?  I am very worried about this and feel the Government should be held accountable and compensate us for what is in effect, criminal incompetence.  Nationwide were fined £980,000 for the loss of a laptop, so it should be that the Government are fined for it’s incompetence, and the money divided among the families, on top of Child Benefit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
